```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,
                      warning=FALSE,

```


```{r load corpus}
l_star_h_types = c("L*H", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Consolidate nuc_contour based on observation and types of register shift.
  mutate(
    acc_phon =
      factor(
        str_replace(nuc_contour,
                    "\\s%$|\\sL%$",
                    ""),
        levels = c("H*", "L*H", ">H*", "^[L*]H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")
      ),
    fin_phon = factor(fin_phon, levels=unique(fin_phon))
  ) %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    nuc_contour,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    h_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )

```

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, eval=FALSE}
# run model
h_f0_model <-
    lmer(
        h_f0 ~ acc_phon + fin_phon + gender +
          (1 + acc_phon | speaker) + (1 | prompt),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
            )
        )
      )

summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step=TRUE) %>% print()
```
-   Convergence and singularity issues (with bobyqa and omptimx).
-   Running model again without (1|prompt).
-   This model works.

#### `h_f0 ~ acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + (1 + mode | speaker)`

```{r run model w/o gender,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9}
# run model
h_f0_model <-
    lmer(
        h_f0 ~ acc_phon + fin_phon + gender + (1 + acc_phon | speaker),
        data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
            optimizer = "optimx",
            calc.derivs = FALSE,
            optCtrl = list(
                method = "nlminb",
                starttests = FALSE,
                kkt = FALSE
                )
            )
        )

summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step=TRUE,
             write="../output_model_anovas/acc_phon_h_f0_anova.csv")

```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, results="asis"}
h_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(h_f0_model,
                                  write = "../output/acc_phon_h_f0"
                                  )

h_f0_model.tidy$r2

```
